data.title: Transcriptional Heterogeneity Overcomes Super-Enhancer Disrupting Drug Combinations in Multiple Myeloma
data.meta_description: Transcriptional regulation of IRF4-MYC feed-forward super-enhancer is the key to IMiD antimyeloma activity, rational therapy combinations, and mechanisms
